title: RELOCATION SPECIALIST! No Fee Rental Service! YES, I ANSWER MY PHONE!
posting_body: ['MOVE IN SPECIALS are my SPECIALTY!', 'FORT LAUDERDALE RELOCATION SPECIALIST', 'I have access to everything on the market!', 'Even Off-MLS!', '----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------', 'RELOCATING TO FLORIDA!', "It's My Specialty!", 'We have helped countless people relocating to the  Fort Lauderdale Area with our FREE referral service - Many Brand New Complexes Offering Specials to Make Your Move More Affordable', 'This Market is tough but there are still some Incredible Deals Still Out There!', 'SOME FREE RENT INCENTIVES ARE STILL AVAILABLE!!!', 'We Have Several Options in Fort Lauderdale, Pompano Beach and the western suburbs to Choose From!', 'We also work in the south Palm Beach areas of Boca Raton and Delray Beach', 'Live in One of the Most Exclusive Areas in S. Florida!', 'First-rate, Top-of-the-Line rentals offering unmatched luxury with virtually every amenity possible and terrific proximity to everything!', 'These complexes offer the rare ability to live in a posh environment and still walk to shopping, dining, etc.. Minutes away from Mizner Park and the beach and a short drive to trendy downtown Atlantic Avenue, restaurants, galleries and clubs!', 'Beautifully appointed residences that feature:', 'Ocean, Intracoastal & City Views', 'Expansive Private Terrraces', 'Custom European Cabinetry, White Quartz Countertops', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Full-sized Washer & Dryer in Every Unit', 'Energy-efficient Windows & Sliding Glass Doors', 'The complexes also feature:', 'Beautiful Entrance Lobbies with Sleek Interiors & Timeless Details', 'Oversized Club Room with High-Speed WiFi, TVs, Bar & Billiards Tables', '24-hour Fitness Center with State-of-the-Art Equipment', 'Cyber Cafe with Gourmet Coffee & High-Speed WiFi', 'Business Center, Billiards Room and Movie Theater', 'Resort Style Pool with Private Cabanas & Fire Pits', 'Penthouse-level Sundeck with Tropical Foliage & Lounge Chairs', "Sunset Lounge with Chef's Kitchen & Private Dining Area", 'Premiere 1, 2 & 3BR apartments available with Dozens of Floor Plans to Choose From', "Call or email me today for more details and to schedule an appointment - don't wait as specials can expire at any time.", 'Never a fee to you!', 'Jamison Troutman', 'Lokation Real Estate', 'Call/Text:', 'show contact info', '... or use email relay in contact tab', 'Apartment community rental rates, move-in specials and apartment unit availability are subject to change, often several times daily.', 'Rental rates shown are the lowest in for the stated size of units in the lowest rent property we offer in the area.', 'It is valid as of the day an ad is initially posted.', 'Please contact us for the most up to date rental rates for individual units.', 'RELOCATION SPECIALIST!', 'No Fee Apartment Referral']
